website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for small room that has additional lighting.
pros: Owners say it works perfectly in bedrooms, offices, and other smaller rooms
cons: Must be used with down rods

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for my tiny room!
customer_reviews.text: Fan works great in our tiny living room! Light is kind of dim which is great for just hanging out, but will need a second light source if trying to do anything that needs attention to detail. Also, it has been very quiet, many other reviews say it can be noisy so I was happy mine is not.
customer_reviews.author: mcurtis

customer_reviews.title: Great fans
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these ceiling fans for 3 of the 4 bedrooms in our most recent home purchase/rehab project. Gives a nice modern feel to the room. My husband said it was mostly an easy to install, took about a 30 minute to install them each - and he has limited ‘handy man’ experience doing these things. I’m only giving this 4 stars because I feel the lights aren’t as bright as I expected. Plenty of light, but not as bright as they could be.
customer_reviews.author: NatashaRTT ABQ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ceiling fan!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ceiling fan. Disregard fire claims as that was an old revision of this fan. If for some reason you receive a unit with a bulb rated more than 40 watts, just purchase a 40 watts bulb or the LED bulb of your choice. It was not the unit itself but the bulb included. Anything else in this fan is just perfect including the price. Don't purchase this unit to third party vendors just fromAmazon or Prime vendors.
customer_reviews.author: E. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking product, but the motors are loud humming garbage
customer_reviews.text: Looks and seems to be quality materials for the price, as it's more expensive looking than it costs. However, I've been using two of these fans in two different bedrooms for about 6 months and can now say with certainty the motors on these fans are garbage! They get louder with near unbearable hum with every passing month, and now I'm forced to buy two new fans yet again already! Don't buy these if you need a reasonably quiet non-humming ceiling fan - you've been warned in advance. That said, if you just want a great looking fan and don't care about loud hum, you're good to go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Praxia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: This 42” fan is perfect for my smaller guest bedroom (Definitely wouldn’t use this size in a large room). I didn’t realize the blades were reversible- I bought it thinking I’d use the ‘pine’ color, but ended up using the charcoal side. Installation was easy. Other reviews have mentioned it’s noisy, but I don’t think so. There is a subtle hum— I personally like it for sleeping. Not the brightest light, but enough for a small room. Light cover seems sturdy— don’t think it’s going anywhere. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase for the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: ELB

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright lights
customer_reviews.text: I installed this myself. It took a little brain power but it wasn't too bad. Things I like: The way it looks, nice modern look. I like that the lights are enclosed so you don't get those nasty bugs dying in a dish I like that the chains have pictures so you easily know which one is the light and which one is the fan. Things I don't like: Because it moves to be level on any ceiling, when you pull the chains, it moves the fan. Not too bad but I don't like it. The lights that it is built for aren't that bright. I have it in a bedroom and I wish I had brighter lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pilling

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product - motor is very loud
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a total of 4 of these fan. It took me a couple months to get them all installed. The first 3 worked great, but the 4th one I installed has a defective motor that has a loud hum and clicks - VERY NOISY. Since I missed my return window I no longer can contact the seller (other than thru this review). I would LOVE to exchange my product for a fan that works well - and would be happy to change my review... but I need to know who & how to contact you!
customer_reviews.author: Lissa Bertalot

customer_reviews.title: Massive performance in moving air around the room!
customer_reviews.text: Small package, smallish unit. Stainless Steel! Excellent price. Quick and simple install. Take note of how it looks finished and assembly is easy. Moves a LOT of air due to the downrod. The only noise heard is the air being rushed towards the floor. I love it. (My old fan was noisy from day 1 and I hated it.) I hope it's not too quiet now!? I'll probably change the bulbs out to a different Kelvin rating as these are a bit too yellow for me, but that can wait. For now I'll enjoy my silent fan. Thankyou Westinghouse!
customer_reviews.author: ONELINE180

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but light fixture does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have installed may ceiling fans in my life. This is not a complicated process. Upon testing my installation I found that the fan worked fine...but the light fixture did not (not to mention a broken bulb). I inspected my electrical connection...and it was correct. Using my voltage meter I found that there was insufficient current flowing through the light fixture to light the bulbs. I believe it would cost at least another $15.00 for a regulator if you wanted to replace it... Well....definitely wasted my money here....and will purchase another fan elsewhere.....I thought Westinghouse was an old honored, American company...Shame on me...
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Ordered at the end of October and it arrived with the glass broken, since I was installing in a rental property I decided to not worry about the return and leave the light bulbs exposed. Sadly it has only been a few months and the fan and light have stopped working completely. Unfortunately I missed the return period so I basically wasted my money. Super disappointed in the quality of this, I would not order again
customer_reviews.author: BowGal44

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond disappointed in this product. I bought it for my son’s room primarily because of the sleek design and the reliability of the brand name. We did not install immediately because my husband was injured. We hired an electrician last week to do the installation and after all was done, the light worked and the fan did not. I am outside the return window so I will have to buy another fan. I am giving 1 star because I am forced to.
customer_reviews.author: Orlene

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a replacement for my old ceiling fan. I was hesistant to buy when I read reviews about the noise from the fan motor and how dim the 2 - 13 Watt CFL bulbs were, I installed 2-A19 LED Bulbs which are 14 Watts each and are equivalent to 100 Watt standard bulbs. Installation and assembly was pretty straight forward, took me about 2 hours.. Using the LED bulbs, the light is very bright and comes on instantly with the light switch. I also noticed that the motor is runs very quietly. A loud quieter than my old ceiling fan. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keyboard Musician

customer_reviews.title: On any speed but high it makes a very annoying groaning electrical sound as the motor spins
customer_reviews.text: JUNK, Pure Junk. This was purchased for a light duty application. On any speed but high it makes a very annoying groaning electrical sound as the motor spins. One can hear this in the next room. Now the bearings are starting to make a dry scraping sound. With any luck this will turn into something that squeaks or squeals which will give me the ambition to climb to the ceiling and replace it with something else. Wish I could give it negative stars.......
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 in total as of this past week and had 1 installed 2 years ago. It's very stylish and easy on the eyes. The light isn't the best but it is dimmable. The light looks yellow not a daylight. If I could change anything I would change the light. It's priced right to buy. It comes with a lifetime limited warranty on the motor and 2 years everything else. I didn't install but it looked pretty easy. The only noise you'll hear is the air generated by it's blade and it doesn't shake at high speeds. 5 stars if the light was better or replaceable so I gave it a 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael In DC

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is and will work.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a 42 inch ceiling fan for a specific spot that. We ordered this one- shipping was really quick! Installation was not easier than the three we previously put up (different brand), nor is it quieter than those, and there is no remote control. I was expecting the gun metal color to be more so, but overall it looks great. A lightbulb came already out so now we have to make a special trip for one. And I am hoping two bulbs make the light useable. The three blades looks great in the room and it will serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking, High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a larger bedroom (about 20 x 22) with sloped ceiling. Looks just right as far as scale is concerned, and the gun metal color fits very nicely with the color scheme. It's a three blade fan, about 42" in diameter when installed. It looks modern and tres chic. Easy to install and only took about 30 minutes. The glass light lens is a nice milky color, and the smaller light bulbs are perfect for low level lighting. This carries a lifetime motor warranty as well, so for under $ 100 you really can't go wrong using this great looking fan.
customer_reviews.author: M. Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Hums unless on high, needs brighter bulbs, looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love the LOOK of this fan however functionally it has some issues. I have 5 of these in my house. Issues: 1. The lights are too dim. Could not be the main light you would rely on unless you switch out the bulbs. 2. The hum! On the lower two settings there is a very apparent hum. As such I can only use it on the highest setting, and when I do the only sound I hear is air moving. Overall it looks beautiful, and does work on high speed well but needs brighter bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Magoon

customer_reviews.title: 4 was great and one make a "youuuu" noise
customer_reviews.text: The ceiling fans look great. Their design is perfectly made for our home. I bought 4 ceiling fans. A big one and 3 small ones. One of the small ones make a "youuuuuu" noise when the fan is on. We have 3 small rooms and the small fans work great. For 13'x14', 10'x13', and 10'x8' rooms. We used the big one and 2 small ones a little over 6 months for now and they help a lot with the circulation of the air in our rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: Won't last two years. So we noticed a problem with the one of the two lights about a month in after installing. You would have to fiddle with the bulb to get the connection right and make the second light work every time you turned it on so eventually we stopped putting the light cover on it. 2 years in and we heard a pop this morning and the bulb and socket are black and charred.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: spend the extra money and buy a ceiling fa other remote control and higher RPMs. Even on high setting you can not feel any air moving. It is very silent and very easy to assemble and install. Provided bulbs produce a LOT of heat, I replaced with LEDs to negate that.
customer_reviews.author: Bubby

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty ceiling fans
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the ceiling fan for the master bedroom in our most recent home purchase/rehab project. We love it! Our realtor loves them, as well as several flippers we know! Gives a nice modern feel to the room. My husband said it was mostly an easy to install, took about a 30 minute to install them - and he has limited ‘handy man’ experience doing these things. I’m only giving this 4 stars because I feel the lights aren’t as bright as I expected. Plenty of light, but not as bright as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: NatashaRTT ABQ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money nor time
customer_reviews.text: Although this ceiling fan is cute an quiet it’s not worth it. If you are purchasing a ceiling fan to keep you cool spend the money and get one with at minimum 5 blades. I still had to turn on my AC to reap the benefits of this fan. Also, I had to purchase my own remote and remote box. The remote box would not fit in the fan so ultimately I left it out as you can see to the left. The fan is much easier to instal if you opt out of using a remote. After having this fan for 2-3 weeks I purchased a new one with 5 blades today.
customer_reviews.author: Tyonna causer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a kids or small room
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small fan for my sons small room and this was just right. Do not put this fan in a large or medium sized room (like master bedroom) it will look tiny. I have an old ranch style home (standard ceiling) and this works for that type of structure. I am pretty sure if I had a vaulted ceiling home I would be greatly unhappy. Update: I have had the light for 6 months and it’s already starting to flicker and become no responsive to the light pulls. I once had 5 stars but now I am giving it 2 since it only lasted well for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: ami

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: I love my new fan, it was easy to install a lot easier than I thought it would be. Keeps my living room which is small cool, and I noted some people say the light is a bit dim, I noticed that as well so I just upgraded the bulbs to some Philips G16 bulbs that give off white instead of yellow light and it's beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these for our kids bedrooms and our guest bedroom. Two are the gunmetal color and one is the satin nickel... I like the style, the size and the air works great for the size rooms we have... my only complaint is the lights aren’t bright enough so we purchased LED bulbs to replace the ones that came with the fans...
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Gal83

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall this fan was a great option for the money. It’s a little louder than I would have liked and I think I should have opted for a slightly larger model. For the room size, this fan does a pretty good job of moving air. It was easy to install and looks good, although the directional switch is somewhat glaring once you notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Collins

customer_reviews.title: great for small rooms
customer_reviews.text: Ceiling fan was easy to install and works great in my son's small cape style bedroom. We needed a smaller sized fan/light because the bedroom has a dormered ceiling window area, and our ceilings are low. this worked great. it's modern looking, and has separate pull chains for light vs fan that are clearly marked with corresponding icons so you always know which is which. the light lets off a good amount of light in the room.
customer_reviews.author: JulieRez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I installed it myself. It wasn’t the easiest to install but if you read the manual carefully and have the stable ladder you shouldn’t have any problem. Regarding the brightness, yes, it is a bit dim as others suggested but it hasn’t been a problem at all. I suppose you can buy brighter bulbs if you want to make it brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Mike j

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan with a stylish look.  Modern...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 of these to replace ceiling fans that needed to be replaced. This way all rooms are uniform. Anyways, just installed the first one. It's not bad to put together, and hung fairly easy. I use the hunter simple connect Bluetooth receivers with it. All three speeds are nice and smooth. The motor seems to turn very easily with no real friction. On high it moves a good amount of air. Low is just to keep the air moving, medium is for when you are sitting right there. I like it because it pushes the air straight down. Not out the sides of the blades. You know it's on. I'll update more when I get to install the remainders.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for small LR or BR!!
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of space in my LR, it is working awesome. I decided to buy one for my BR today. I also purchased, on a separate order, the Bogao (5 Pack) LED Candelabra Bulb, 12W Daylight LED Candle Bulbs, 85-100 Watt Light Bulbs Equivalent, E12 Candelabra Base,1200 Lumens LED Lights,Torpedo Shape White 6000K. I have 3 left over, so helped with the decision. There is very little with these bulbs and they does a great job lighting up my 12x16 LR. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: DnAustin

customer_reviews.title: Noisy fan while on
customer_reviews.text: This fan makes an awful sound while on. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a vaulted ceiling; Small enough to not helicopter your sheetrock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and runs great. Took me 8 months to install but wasnt because the directions were hard (im just a procrastinator) The lightbulbs they give you are terrible. Get LEDs and BRIGHT ones. Think more than 500 lumens. The way the fixture is designed is to be low profile so you end up with an interesting color scheme with the way the lens is frosted. I like it though. My wife says the color is romantic. Oh and the fan is quiet and doesnt wobble as long as you're not a nimbus and know how to install fans.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace the old fan in our small kitchen. It runs quiet and works great. The light isn't very bright, which works great for us. If you are looking for a lot of light, you may want to get some different light bulbs than the one that comes with it. We just installed it a few days ago, so can't speak to longevity yet but it looks nice and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: WaresWashington

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! I bought 3 of these in 2016 for 2 bedrooms and living room. Now I’m back three years later buying 2 more for the other bedroom an kitchen. We have low 8’ ceilings and the low profile is perfect. We use them every day (almost 24/7 in the summer) and haven’t had any problems. Also bought the remote for them, so it’s a perfect combo.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this fan!! Very modern and fit perfectly in our space! Had a little trouble balancing it, but we have installed several fans so we were able to get it working properly! I hated the yellow lights that came with it and replaced with white LED! Matches much better IMO!
customer_reviews.author: LilHappy

customer_reviews.title: MOSTLY a great fan and good value
customer_reviews.text: The only cons on this fan are the light and bulbs that come with it are dim. You can upgrade the light to more wattage, but the frosted glass cover still darkens it. Also it's a bit tedious to install. Other than that, I'm not sure yet about the longevity of the remote or fan, but we will see. It looks good and is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Muse

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy. It has an annoying hum. Very sorry we purchased 2 but thinking Westinghouse they would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ceiling Fan
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a ceiling fan in my bedroom and like the look of this one so I bought it. I've had it over a month and am happy to report no issues. My handyman said installation was simple. My only complaint is that the light is pretty dim but nothing an additional lamp can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little fan. Not the best quality but good design and nice to look at for what you pay. Totally worth it if you can get it on sale. I purchased this for my bedroom and while I don't plan on using it often I do like having the option of a ceiling fan. I do agree with other reviews that the fan motor could be a little quieter. All in all, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Z. Rahimi

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend at all!
customer_reviews.text: There was an annoying noise from the moment we installed it. I would describe this noise as a humming electric motor noise it's loud enough that it's hard to sleep with.I have purchased dozens and dozens of products from Amazon and this is truly the first and only product I've disliked I'm surprised for such a big company like Westinghouse to put out something so inadequate.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan!
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Lights are not very bright but I can get different bulbs. Slight whining noise but unless I’m listening for it, I don’t really hear it. Puts off a great amount of air. I don’t like that when you pull on the chains, the whole fan moves.
customer_reviews.author: KiminAL

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot for a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed a marked difference in the temperature in my bedroom using this. I read complaints about the humming noise it makes, but I only notice it when its on a lower setting and there is no noise in my room at all. So If you're reading a book in silence it might be noticeable, but if you're watching TV not distracting.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fans
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these for my bedrooms. They work great!!! 3 settings. The highest setting really cools the room down. They are really easy to clean and look nice. Very modern looking. There is quite a bit of noise when on, but I am used to it. Works as a sound machine, haha.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyseller33

customer_reviews.title: Defect ceiling fan after completing installation
customer_reviews.text: After installation, I noticed the fan was not aligned from the top side. It was either bent r assembled wrong way. Fan also made metal grinding noise from somewhere. I did called the Amazon and was told to return it but my time installing this fan and effort was wasted. 1. I had a replacement unit and this thing is a JUNK!!! it makes humming noise it's very loud it gets louder at night time. returning this I guess you get what you pay for. Do not buy if noise level isn't your concern.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Sheen

customer_reviews.title: Good deal. Nice product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Modern. On the smaller side but would buy again. Bought 2. Picture here shows light output that came with it but I would put brighter bulbs next time. Light output was a bit too Amber. Therefore, only issue were the light bulbs included. Picture here does not display the actual light effect as the picture was brightened.
customer_reviews.author: Pea.rock7

customer_reviews.title: Quality isnt that great. CHEAP MADE
customer_reviews.text: This is a fan for a kids room. Looks better in Amazon's Picture than the actual product. Easy to install, but lacks a cover that would cover the upper mount so wires can not be shown. The fan does have a locking guide at top mount but when you go to pull either switch it moves the fan. This is why I give it 2 stars, only because installation is simple
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Loud Humm...
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews. about the loud "HUMM". But I thought they might have installed their fan wrong. This is my 3rd Westinghouse ceiling fan that I have purchased from Amazon this year. My first 2 do not hum.. This one does... Its true. Unless you are hard of hearing, then I would not recommend this fan. Unfortunately I would love to send it back and purchase a different one, but I do not want to go through the hassel of taking it down and having to ship this back. But it is getting temping.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sturdy fan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan, especially for the price. Extremely easy to put together and is very quite when running. Considering how small it is, it moves quite a bit of air. It's got the modern contemporary look which is what I wanted. I really dislike that it came with chandelier sized bulbs though. They were very dim, but I planned on upgrading them to LED. Just had to buy a different kind of bulb then then the ones I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Ran smoothly and quietly. Looks a lot better than the ceiling fans at big box stores. It is a little min the smaller side, but still on the highest setting it produces a good amount of air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install - Reversible Blades
customer_reviews.text: (so check if one is sold out, it could just be another color on Amazon!) Easy to install, I did it in about 30 mins per fan, first time is a bit tricky, but 2nd is a breeze. I'd suggest this fan - high quality all around and even comes with bulbs, non-led Incandescent though. .
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Irurueta

customer_reviews.title: Too loud for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: WAAAAAAAY too loud. On low, the hum from the motor is incredibly loud, too loud to sleep with. We bought 2 of these for our master bedroom. They seemed the perfect size for what we needed, but I don't think I can get over there noise. It's a shame, as they look really nice, and they move a lot of air for the small size! Will be looking for a replacement ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Makes a buzzing noise at times but still nice!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and works fine. Easy to install but the only negative is that it makes a buzzing sound randomly on and off. It's not to loud when it makes the buzzing sound but you can defiantly hear it. The buzzing sound does go away after a few seconds and sometimes a few minutes but over all not a deal breaker for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ivan aldana

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Some light whirring
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Some light whirring, but I did not expect a fan at this price to be completely silent. I've read other reviews and saw that it did not move air much, but I disagree. Med and high setting will put some air in yo face. It is not very bright, which is what I wanted, but if you expect this to fill a room with bright light, you might want to think about picking up some super bulbs that fit it. I live in a somewhat small apartment, and this is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Loud Humming Fan
customer_reviews.text: Amazon always takes care of his customers. Requested a return, and refund for this fan. I bought 2 of them and both had a very loud humming noise. One much louder than the other. Even tried them off the ceiling just to make sure, the slow and slower speeds were humming loud, the fast speed much less. Now I can assure you that it's the motor and not the way I mounted them as i mounted so many fans in my career. Amazon is amazing at taking care of their customers as usual. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Ok fan for the money. Looks modern. Quite for now. Biggest disappointment is light glass to dark and does not allow much of the light out. Makes very dark. End up buying super bright pesto have ok lighting
customer_reviews.author: Vm

customer_reviews.title: Shakes, hums, and rolls.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered tis fan to replace an older, out of style fan in my office. The old one was wobble free, but did hum at low speeds, and I didn't like this. I installed this fan, and like many of the other reviews, found some of the screws did not fit correctly. Once everything was said and done, I was very disappointed. No matter what I did, it wobbled at all speeds. And, to make matters worse, it hummed louder than the old fan I took out, I ended up removing it and sending it back and buying a Hunter. While I will say the fan looked nice, it was way too loud for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Blahetka

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small space
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in our "office closet" which has no air vent and is situated on an outside wall. In hot Texas summers this provides the perfect amount of airflow for my husband to not pass out from the heat
customer_reviews.author: Mrsn

customer_reviews.title: Very loud motor him. Seized up eventually.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is extremely loud. Was not used very often due to the noise. (it was for my kids room) Even with the minimal use of the fan it has seized up and no longer works. You get what you pay for I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Fan quit after only two months.
customer_reviews.text: Fan quit working just over two months after installation. The return window has passed, so now we’re stuck with an expensive ceiling light. It looks nice, but is apparently not well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: this one popped onto the screen and it was love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time searching for the right fan and in the end, after deciding on several others, this one popped onto the screen and it was love at first sight! Not to mention the price was AMAZING!!! I was comparing fans at twice the price and here was the perfect choice for my small living room. It is a beautiful ceiling hugger, blends in well, and as I slowly prepare this house to sell, I will have the oak floors sanded and stained to match the fan!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.  Handsome too.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. Sucked to Install by ones self so grab someone to hold it up with you. Looks great. Has a modern vibe to it. Pretty quiet Too if it wasn’t for the hurricane winds it produces I wouldn’t even know it was on.
customer_reviews.author: RJK

customer_reviews.title: Yep, that bulb is dim
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the light is dim. I bought a cheap replacement LED at the HD box store, but it produced too much heat and I was worried about fire, so I went back to the dim original. If you replace bulb, find one that doesn't build up so much heat! Looks good, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a great fan! Looks amazing, you must use the drop bar to mount, but it's a few inches, and the light globe is plastic and screws on so you can't replace it with a different one. Maybe a replacement one from the manufacturer?? These things aren't deal breakers for me, but I didn't see those details in the listing so thought I'd put them in my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Light can’t be replaced
customer_reviews.text: When the light goes out it’s all crimp-sealed in place. Lights were all out within 18 months. You can not replace the bulb. 2 of my three fans grind when they spin. The light is not bright. Cheap price, poor longevity from a name brand.
customer_reviews.author: bluesmann4u

customer_reviews.title: Modern and moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: Love this modern look in this fan. Runs whisper quite. No wobbles. Low profile light. Moves a lot of air. Looks so good in the living room; not cheap stuff like big box store sale. Love the gun metal color, very unusual.
customer_reviews.author: K nurse

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, we love this. It's in our sons room and has the perfect color finish on it. It's a little metallic but still masculine. We also like that the pull strings have a little light and fan diagram on the ends so you know which one to pull for light or fan.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great even with its small blades but the lights it comes with a quite dim as it uses those smaller bulbs. Would not look good in a big room. A bit noisy at highest speed.
customer_reviews.author: Fab

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: The fan is perfect for small and medium size rooms. It works well in winters to circulate the warm air that has risen. In the summer it does well as an augment to the central A/C. Installation was too easy
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to install with clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan, quieter than most. Research shows that Westinghouse is comparable to Hunter in ceiling fan quality, that three fan blades move more air than five, and that fans without fancy LED lights and remote controls last longer without need for more expensive replacement parts. Stick with the basics for a reliable fan that will probably outlast the others.
customer_reviews.author: Dottiebelle

customer_reviews.title: Good compact fan.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking fan. Easy to install. The pull chains are a bit shorter than others so you may want to consider getting extensions. The chain ends do have little decals engrained in them to make it easy to know which chain is for the light or the fan. The fan does hum a little bit. It is not completely quite but it isn't loud enough to keep you awake at night.
customer_reviews.author: K. KalvelageTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for small rooms
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and very pleased with the 2 I purchased. I gave 4 stars as it says it can handle a bigger room than I think it can. Small room 10 by 10 or smaller great. In my larger bedroom 11 by 14, well I could have used a bit more air flow. The pull strings are also a bit short as 5.1 I need a high step stool to reach. Still it looks great and works well, quiet operation. For the price it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey C.

customer_reviews.title: Loud and unbalanced, a stain on the once great name
customer_reviews.text: We installed this overhead in our small office nook area. Needless to say quiet operation was a must, something this thing cannot do. It is very loud at low speed and becomes very wobbly at higher than the lowest setting. I am very disappointed, will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Carabina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, mostly quiet but has great air flow. May need to put in brighter bulbs but the glass comes off fairly easy. Has a lifetime warranty on the motor so keep your paperwork.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking fan
customer_reviews.text: Good looking fan, great price, decent to OK air flow. My biggest disappointment with this fan is the noise level from the fan motor and bearings. It is probably the loudest I've ever heard. The noise is on par with the noise created by the blowing of the air. I wouldn't be surprised if the bearing or motor gives out in the next year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Cute light
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and quite. It wobbles little when fan works but makes almost no noisy. Due to the frosted glass the light is dim but bearable after switching to 60w lightbulb. If you need very bright light it is not for you
customer_reviews.author: M Park

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan, it fit perfect in my location. I didn’t want a huge fan, I wanted something with simple design but attractive & modern. This fan did the bill, easy install, attractive, functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Humming and a low grinding noise
customer_reviews.text: I just installed the fan today. I love the way it looks, but when the fan is on a high setting, it sounds like it's going to break, on medium and low settings you here the motor making a humming noise. I don't think this is normal. My light switch is standard and does not have the dimming switch. That is why I am giving it a 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking take on a modern fan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking take on a modern fan. Moves the air pretty decently, but the light is surprisingly dim and included bulbs run very hot. I'd like to switch out to LED's, but the globe is difficult to remove. I know it will be super annoying now that it's mounted, so I'm procrastinating for bit. Once I make the swap, I hope it corrects both the heat and the dimness issue.
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Not noisy, works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fan, exactly what I was looking for my living room, modern and clean lines. I was concern about some reviews saying it was noisy....it is not. I recommend and I’m satisfy with this little fan.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi B

customer_reviews.title: Compact in size Huge in value...
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great little fan/light... I was somewhat concerned about the light being “too dim”, but after replacing the bulbs with a couple of 40 watt clear LEDs ($3.99 pk of 3), the light is good and the fan is quiet and powerful!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 fans - 1 for the office and 1 for the guest room. The fans are sleek in design and easy to install. They make little to no noise when on while still providing a great flow of air into the room. The provided light bulbs are not very bright but get the job done. Overall, this was a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan :P
customer_reviews.text: We have high ceilings and used the additional extensions on two fans that we got for the 2 rooms upstairs. Summer and winter settings are perfect for the 4 season environment. Super cheap and super modern look is what got me and I love it. Had it for a couple of months now and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya2012

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedrooms
customer_reviews.text: Very modern looking. updating house and after painting 2 teenager boys rooms this fan finished the look perfectly. very easily installed. very quiet. very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Include A Remote
customer_reviews.text: Q&A section indicates a remote kit is included, however this fan does NOT have a remote. I ordered two and unfortunately, must return both and reorder elsewhere. This was a tremendous hassle and I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: These are ultra quiet and look nice. You never have to lubricate them. Installing was a pain because I put the bracket too far up inside the junction box and had a hard time getting the canopy on. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS STUNNING
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this fan. Its large enough for his 16 x 20 bedroom. Remote control is awesome to have and it looks stunning. Considering getting one for my master bedroom. Consider an electrician if installing yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Liuvlaf2

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursery!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect for our son’s nursery! It isn’t huge, but it’s perfect for a smaller room. The black/gun metal color fits the room design and complements it. It’s quiet on high, which is essential with a newborn. The lighting that was provided is poor, but we planned on switching to LED anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, this is a great deal. It works smoothly, puts out a good breeze, and a nice light. Especially for the price I have no complaints! Note that it does not come with a remote control
customer_reviews.author: cccamazon

customer_reviews.title: Damaged fan blade
customer_reviews.text: The product produces nice air flow for a small-medium size room and appears modern and simple. The reason for my 3-stars is from the light fixture and one of the blades came damaged. Because of the position of the light fixture the light does not produce much brightness, so I it fine if you have windows or lamps in the room as well. Also, one of the blades came damaged on the edge, which was unfortunate. I installed the fan anyway because I could not wait to ship back and find a different fan.
customer_reviews.author: Brius

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job but not the best fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and functionality of the fan itself, but the light is another issue. Do not buy this fan if it’s uour only source of light in the room! Comes with 40w bulbs which were very dim! I upgraded to 60w led(9w equiv) and still same issue! Fan moves a lot of air and that’s the most important part. I wouldn’t buy this again though
customer_reviews.author: Torrie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, easy to install fan for smaller areas. Purchased for our 8’x20’ back porch area and it works like a charm & is whisper quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Angi P

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a very good value for the money. Installation was very easy, the fan runs well, and is quite. My only complaint is the lack of the brightness of the bulbs. Even with LEDS installed, the light cover some how subdued the lights.
customer_reviews.author: daniel anderson

customer_reviews.title: Small, sleek and modern
customer_reviews.text: I definitely had to get an electrician for this one. Fans are pretty heavy, so the old one I needed help getting down, but this one isn’t too bad and is great for smaller rooms! Sleek and modern.
customer_reviews.author: OfficialhairbyCoco

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan. Two things that made me pick 4 stars. The first is that the thing uses tiny base screw bulbs. This folied my plans for easily upgrading to LED, but at least useable bulbs are included. The second minor issue is that there is an assortment of non metallic washers in the hardware kit. Based on the size and quantity they should be used for the attchment of the blades, but the instructions do not showmor explain how to apply these washers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Day

customer_reviews.title: Good for a closet
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in our nursery - not a large room - and unfortunately will have to replace it before the baby gets here. You can feel a breeze if you're on a ladder and have your hand 12" or less from the fan. There's also noticeable motor noise even after balancing and ensuring all parts were tight. This might do well for a walk in closet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks!!! Powerful and quiet motor. Works with my Lutron fan/light dimmer control switch, removed the two pull chain switchs and inserted brushed nickel hole caps. Like the fact I can change the blade colors by flipping it around. I replaced the bulbs with G16.5 dimmable LED, much brighter and efficient. I wish it came with plywood blades and medium base light bulbs (-1 star), like the Westinghouse 52" Alloy. If my room was bigger I would've got the bigger version.
customer_reviews.author: Ped

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic
customer_reviews.text: This fan is decent for the price. I’m not sure if it routinely comes with a remote control but we did not receive one. I would say it is a very basic fan, took 2 people one hour to instal and looks pretty nice
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: We put 2 of them in our family room. Cools the room great! Look pretty cool too! Definitely worth the money. No problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought and installed this fan to replace an ugly light fixture in my living room. It took about an hour to install and I suck at doing this kind of stuff. The directions were somewhat understandable, but I did need to use my own common sense to figure it out. It definitely does the job for our fairly large living room, and looks beautiful doing it.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Two years now...No issues.
customer_reviews.text: We put them up ourselves in the kids' rooms. Installation was easy. The kids run them constantly with minimal effect on the electric bill. It keeps the rooms cool and lit (pun intention if you wish).
customer_reviews.author: Nick F

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 7876400 Alloy 42-Inch Gun Metal Indoor Ceiling Fan, Light Kit with Opal Frosted Glass, 42 Inch
product_meta.description:
Style:Non-LED| Size:42 Inch| Color:Gun MetalThe Westinghouse Alloy Indoor Ceiling Fan features a luminous gun metal finish and black/graphite reversible blades that add a hint of glamour to its modern design. 

The opal frosted glass light kit blends seamlessly with the design and will bring bright illumination to your home.

Three fan speeds (high/medium/low) and a reversible switch help you stay cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Add the striking Alloy to any room in your home and enjoy year-round comfort and elegance. 

This Westinghouse ceiling fan is backed by a lifetime motor warranty and a two-year warranty on all other parts. Product reference number 78764. Never place a switch where it can be reached from a tub or shower
feature_bullets: Contemporary Indoor 42-inch ceiling fan is ideal for small rooms up to 100 square feet (10 feet by 10 feet)
153-millimeter by 10-millimeter silicon steel motor with dual capacitor; three fan speeds (high/medium/low); reversible switch for year-round use
Fan Performance on High SpeedAirflow: 2, 897 cfm; Energy Usage: 53 watts without light; Airflow Efficiency: 55 cfm per watt
Includes 3/4-inch by 4-inch down rod, 78-inch lead wire, and two candelabra-base 40-watt G16-1/2 light bulbs
Lifetime on motor; two-year on all other parts. Amp (High): 0. 44

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,861 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
